    • startSaver

      private void startSaver()

    • newConnection

      public void newConnection(String playerNickname) throws ConnectionRefusedException, FirstConnectionException
      Handles a new connection from the network
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname of the player trying to connect
      Throws:
      ConnectionRefusedException - if the connection may not be established
      FirstConnectionException - if this is the first connection, a different method must be invoked

    • newConnection

      public void newConnection(String playerNickname, int numUsers) throws FirstConnectionException, InvalidNumUsersException
      Method to invoke if the connection to be established is the first
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - nickname of the player trying to connect
      numUsers - number of players for the new game
      Throws:
      FirstConnectionException - if this is NOT the first connection, a different method must be invoked
      InvalidNumUsersException - if the number of players is not valid

    • playStarterCard

      public void playStarterCard(String playerNickname, Boolean frontVisible) throws NoSuchPlayerException, MoveNotAllowedException, InvalidStarterSideException
      Allows a player to place its starter Card
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - player nickname
      frontVisible - true if the card will be facing up (showing the front side)
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
      MoveNotAllowedException - propagated
      InvalidStarterSideException - propagated

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(String playerNickname, String objectiveId) throws NoSuchPlayerException, MoveNotAllowedException, ObjectiveNotAllowedException
      Allows a player to choose its objective card
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - player nickname
      objectiveId - id of the chosen objective
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
      MoveNotAllowedException - propagated
      ObjectiveNotAllowedException - propagated

    • placeSide

      public void placeSide(String playerNickname, Card card, Boolean frontVisible, int i, int j) throws PlacementNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, MoveNotAllowedException, InvalidSideException, InvalidCoordinatesException, InvalidCardException, NoAdjacentCardException
      Allows a player to place a card
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - player nickname
      card - card placed
      frontVisible - true if the card will be facing up (showing the front side)
      i - row to place the card
      j - column to place the card
      Throws:
      PlacementNotAllowedException - propagated
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
      NotYourTurnException - propagated
      MoveNotAllowedException - propagated
      InvalidSideException - propagated
      InvalidCoordinatesException - propagated
      InvalidCardException - propagated
      NoAdjacentCardException - propagated

    • drawDeck

      public void drawDeck(String playerNickname, Boolean fromGold) throws NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, MoveNotAllowedException, EmptyDeckException
      Allows a player to draw a card from the decks
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - player nickname
      fromGold - true if the card is drawn from the GoldCard deck
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
      NotYourTurnException - propagated
      MoveNotAllowedException - propagated
      EmptyDeckException - propagated

    • drawVisible

      public void drawVisible(String playerNickname, Card visible) throws MoveNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, InvalidVisibleCardException
      Allows a player to draw a visible card
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - player nickname
      visible - visible card chosen to draw
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - propagated
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
      NotYourTurnException - propagated
      InvalidVisibleCardException - propagated
